name: California State Preschool Program (CSPP)
description: Free or low-cost preschool for 3-4 year olds to prepare for kindergarten
fullDescription: The California State Preschool Program provides free or low-cost preschool to income-eligible 3 and 4 year olds to prepare them for kindergarten.
whatTheyOffer:
- Free preschool for eligible children (ages 3-4)
- Part-day and full-day programs available
- Developmentally appropriate curriculum
- Nutritious meals and snacks
- Parent involvement opportunities
- Transition support to kindergarten
howToGetIt:
1. Must meet income eligibility (typically below 85% of State Median Income)
2. Child must be 3 or 4 years old
3. Programs available at school districts and community organizations
4. Contact local school district or resource and referral agency
5. Complete application and income verification
keywords: state preschool, CSPP, free preschool, California, pre-K, early childhood, low-income, 3-4 years, childcare, school readiness
